channel.title: Comments on: Easy Multithreading with Visual FoxPro

item.title: By: Kevin Ragsdale
item.dc:creator: Kevin Ragsdale
item.description:
Hi Jim,
In my experience, the _VFP.AutoYield setting has no noticeable effect.
Hope this helps, Kevin
item.content:encoded:
Hi Jim,

In my experience, the _VFP.AutoYield setting has no noticeable effect.

Hope this helps,
Kevin

item.title: By: Jim Frye
item.dc:creator: Jim Frye
item.description:
Thanks for a great presentation. I do have one very important question regarding the threads. Does the _vfp.autoyield=.f. setting effect results as it does in the vfp Parallel Fox?
Thanks for all you do for the VFP community. You Rock!
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for a great presentation. I do have one very important question regarding the threads. Does the _vfp.autoyield=.f. setting effect results as it does in the vfp Parallel Fox?

Thanks for all you do for the VFP community. You Rock!
